document.heading: District of Columbia Resident Tax Credit Act of 1978

history.narrative: Law 2-146, the “District of Columbia Resident Tax Credit Act of 1978,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-370, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 28, 1978 and December 12, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-323 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
